title: played 6 or so games as sejuani
body:
wow, this is seriously the most satisfying jungle i've found since new jungle released.

she is the only tank in this game that stays relevant throughout. extremely tanky, %health on w, lots of cc and slows, and some pretty solid damage from what i've seen. ive never built a damage item as her either.

riot please don't nerf her.

one of the few viable jungles i've played that can actually clear gromp/blue/wolves/red/raptors without having to back

replies.body:
lol go top lane sejuani. scaling health seals, armor marks, mr glyphs, armor quints,
21-9-0 ap masteries, and she SHIT on all melee top laners. trust me c;
